Scarecrow's Last Stand

CLOCK HERE

Start

Instructions

Every night, the birds come for your corn.
Since the farmhands passed, it is up to you to protect the farm's remaining legacy.
Shower the crows with affection! Feed them with love!
But don't get too close! Birds terrify the scarecrow.
Too much fright will slow you down. Too much courage, on the other hand...

WASD - run

Spacebar - shoot hearts

P - pause/play

Click - create tower

Restart
